free_trial: 7 days free trial, no credit-card or commitment, give us a try!

meta.description: Calensync allows you to synchronize multiple Google calendars easily and affordably, while keeping the privacy of the event description. It copies events between calendars and replaces them with a Blocker.

hero.title: Sync your Google Calendars
hero.heading: Trusted by hundreds of users to merge their Google calendars together and avoid conflicts.

value.1_content: No limit on the number of accounts and calendars you want to sync together. Gotta catch them all!
value.2_content: When an event is created or modified, it is updated on all calendars in seconds.
value.3_content: For each calendar, you can decide whether to copy the event details, or replace them with `Busy`, allowing you to control your privacy
value.4_content: You can have all your calendars synchronized in less than a minute. Don't believe us? Go ahead and get started right now!

faq.a1: No, Calensync only creates new events and doesn't ever modify or delete existing events. If the original event changes, the copies are automatically updated too.
faq.q2: How many different calendars can I link together?
faq.a2: You can sync as many calendars from as many different Google accounts together.
faq.q3: Is the name of the event and description copied?
faq.a3: When you setup your synchronizations, you can decide whether to copy the name and description, or replace it with `Busy`, giving you complete control over your privacy.
faq.a4: This slightly depends on Google, but count between 1 second to a maximum of 1 minute.
faq.q5: Do you save data about my events? and do you resell it or share it?
faq.a5: We do not save any data about your events, nor do we share it or resell it.

meta.description: As a freelancer it's always hard to balance multiple missions and personal events. Calensync simplifies your life by syncing multiple Google Calendars and avoiding event conflicts.

hero.title: Never reschedule again
hero.heading: As a freelancer, you're often juggling multiple projects on top of your own life. Make it simpler and avoid having to reschedule events.

value.1_content: Multiple business accounts? Personal calendars? No problem with unlimited accounts.
value.2_content: When an event is created or modified, it is updated on all calendars in seconds. Your clients will know immediately if they can book you or not
value.3_content: Information about events is not synchronized between calendars - clients will just see a Blocker
value.4_content: So why wait? Get started right now, and save yourself time while avoiding future problems!
